overview: In 1988, Taileen falls into a deep coma, the result of a car accident that claims the lives of her parents. Twelve years later she wakes to a new world, a new body and a new life... the life of an angel of the circle. Now, at the age of twenty-four, Taileen must confront her fears and prepare for the greatest challenge of her life.
tagline: The circle was created by The Almighty after Lucifer sent three of his fallen to rain havoc on man...
title: 6 Angels
